name: Idle Taxi Capitalist Tycoon
description:
Want to start your own taxi business and grow your business to become a taxi capitalist tycoon? If you love taxis and transportation business, you will love this virtual business game of taxis. It is unique and extremely entertaining.

Idle Taxi Capitalist Tycoon is a game where you start your own taxi business, buy taxis and lease them to earn money. You hire drivers to drive your taxis and you earn more money if you hire better drivers. Make profit out of your taxi business and become a Taxi Capitalist Tycoon.

“Idle Taxi Capitalist Tycoon” is the best game for unlimited fun and entertaining business. You can track your earnings for all vehicles on the app and watch your money grow while your taxis are doing businesses. It is a perfect way to test your business and money making skills.

The game is all about right set of business skills needed at the right time.! Get ready for the most amazing taxi business game and test your business skills to become a taxi capitalist tycoon. Focus and play carefully! This is an amazing business strategy game.
Decide on your business strategy to balance out your income and expenses. The taxi business game "Taxi Capitalist Tycoon" is really fun with thrilling sound effects and beautiful game graphics. Download the game and get ready to challenge your own skills.

-- SAY HELLO --

We are constantly working hard on making the “Idle Taxi Capitalist Tycoon” game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the “Taxi Capitalist Tycoon” game, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

* “Idle Taxi Capitalist Tycoon” is a game developed by KEISE Entertainment, the creators of “Tuber More or Less” and “Another Dinosaur Run Game”! *
